amendment.description: To require a report on plans to alleviate congestion and flight delays in the New York/New Jersey/Philadelphia Airspace.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2823 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2823 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S11373-11374; text: CR S11374) To require a report on plans to alleviate congestion and flight delays in the New York/New Jersey/Philadelphia Airspace.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2823 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2823 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Clinton.
